synopsis.text: Asuka Jun, a spirited young woman from a prestigious family, faces an unwelcome tradition on her 18th birthday: an arranged marriage. Desperate to avoid a loveless union, Jun defies her family's expectations and escapes the castle with her loyal servant, Kurata Onami. But her mother won't let her go without a fight, dispatching a ruthless group of thugs to capture and tarnish Jun's purity. With her formidable combat skills and unyielding determination, Jun must confront her would-be suitors in a brutal battle to protect her freedom and preserve her virginity. Will Jun's strength and resilience be enough to overcome her mother's schemes and secure her own destiny?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
